msg: With OTP releases up to R13B03 it's not possible to define a 2 macro functions with the same name and different arities.

author: slaws
msg: Move up to Apache parent pom v7. Needed this to do SNAPSHOT deploy to Nexus. To keep the pom clean I've upgraded the OSGI version being used as 4.2 isn't available in central.
